_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The things that an educated noble discip: Form, which is liable to originate
Form, which is liable to vanish
Form, which is liable to originate and vanish
Feeling, which is liable to originate
Feeling, which is liable to vanish
Feeling, which is liable to originate and vanish
Perception, which is liable to originate
Perception, which is liable to vanish
Perception, which is liable to originate and vanish
Choices, which is liable to originate
Choices, which is liable to vanish
Choices, which is liable to originate and vanish
Consciousness, which is liable to originate
Consciousness, which is liable to vanish
Consciousness, which is liable to originate and vanish.
